pullrequest.title: Instantaneous traffic shaper included in cloudsim

content.raw:
Suggest using a different variable name here and on line 319 below to avoid confusion, because it's not always a simulation key.  Something like `key_pair_name` would be better.

The same goes for the other variables below that have `sim` in the name.  I guess that this code was originally operating only on simulation machines directly.  Better to do a little renaming so that we aren't confused next time we read it.
content.html:
Suggest using a different variable name here and on line 319 below to avoid confusion, because it's not always a simulation key. Something like key_pair_name would be better.

The same goes for the other variables below that have sim in the name. I guess that this code was originally operating only on simulation machines directly. Better to do a little renaming so that we aren't confused next time we read it.
